get.summary: Get a list of items in the trash
Get information about an item in the trash

post.description: The ID used in this endpoint is the ID given to the item when it is put in the trash, not the original ID from the resource, i.e. its project ID. Please use the GET /v2/trash endpoint to find the item’s trash ID.
post.summary: Restore an item from the trash back to its active state

post.description: Unzip one or more Runs. The status will update right away, but the unzip process itself is async
post.summary: Bulk Unzip.

post.description: Intitiates a User account transfer. API only kicks off the process which itself is async.
post.summary: User account transfer. Requires Administrator role

parameters.name: applicationid
parameters.description: If specified, only return agreements for this application. If not, only return agreements not associated with an application.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: If specified, only return agreements with titles exactly matching the specified value.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: If specified, only return agreements with category exactly matching the specified value.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Expand or filter the agreements returned. Include=Expired will return expired agreements, giving a history of all agreements ever signed by the user. Include=Pending looks for agreements that the user hasn't signed yet.

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: The field(s) used to sort the result set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: sortdir
parameters.description: The sort direction for the result set

get.summary: Get a list of messages that have been sent to a specific user.

parameters.name: streamtype
parameters.description: The classification of user notifications to receive. Applicable values are 'All', 'Activity', 'Storage', 'DataDeletion', 'Subscription', 'CMS'

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category within a 'Stream' of user notifications to receive. Currently only 'Activity' Stream supports Categories. Applicable values are 'All', 'Run', 'AppSession', 'Invite'

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: The field(s) used to sort the result set

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return

DestinationFolderPath.title: DestinationFolderPath
DestinationFolderPath.description: The folder path from the GDS volume to upload the file to

Target.title: Target
Target.description: The service to upload the file to. For example, target=gds will upload the file to the user's gds volume

TechnicalTag.title: TechnicalTag
TechnicalTag.description: ICA technical tag used to query the folder

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Possible values are: Active, Failed, Consumed, QCFailed

Jwt.title: Jwt
Jwt.description: Stratus JWT issued by platform upon user login

InstrumentRunId.title: InstrumentRunId
InstrumentRunId.description: The instrument run ID value that should be used (instrument generated)

RunName.title: RunName
RunName.description: The name of run that was edited in the instrument

SampleSheetName.title: SampleSheetName
SampleSheetName.description: Sample sheet name used in instrument

AppVersionSlug.title: AppVersionSlug
AppVersionSlug.description: The Application that the token is issued to

Scope.title: Scope
Scope.description: The requested scope for the token

PlatformUserId.title: PlatformUserId
PlatformUserId.description: The user that is granting the token

PlatformWorkgroupId.title: PlatformWorkgroupId
PlatformWorkgroupId.description: If provided, workgroup context for the token

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The name of the analysis workflow

AppSessionId.title: AppSessionId
AppSessionId.description: The ID of the appsession to gather settings from when creating the workflow

Optional.title: Optional
Optional.description: Describes whether the QCThreshold is Optional or Required. By default it is set to Required

DatasetTypeId.title: DatasetTypeId
DatasetTypeId.description: The dataset type slug, e.g. illumina.issac.v4

ThresholdValues.title: ThresholdValues
ThresholdValues.description: Integer values of the thresholds. A comma separated list can be given for the “Between” and “Outside” operators

Type.title: Type
Type.description: The type of dependency to add, valid operators include: “BioSampleYield”, “AppCompletion”

Attributes.title: Attributes
Attributes.description: Sections containing a list of attributes and their values defining the app launch dependency, specific to the dependency type given

Dependencies.title: Dependencies
Dependencies.description: Optional nested dependencies, not needed for BioSampleYield or AppCompletion dependency types

StatusSummary.title: StatusSummary
StatusSummary.description: Initial value for StatusSummary in AppSession

StatusSummary.title: StatusSummary
StatusSummary.description: A summary of why or how the status changed, seen in the tooltip when clicking an analysis’ status

QcStatus.title: QcStatus
QcStatus.description: Possible values are: QcPassed, QcFailed, Discarded

DeliveryStatus.title: DeliveryStatus
DeliveryStatus.description: Possible values are: Undefined, DoNotDeliver, OnHold, ReadyForDelivery, DeliveryFailed, DeliveryInProgress, Delivered

OutputProjectId.title: OutputProjectId
OutputProjectId.description: Specifies the BSSH project that the BSSH appsession and BSSH datasets output by the ICA analysis will appear in.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name of the setting, must use alphanumeric, dash or underscore characters

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The value of the setting, which can be true or false for a Boolean setting or text for a string setting

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Data type, possible values include: bool, string

BioSampleName.title: BioSampleName
BioSampleName.description: The name of the biosample, which must be unique and only contain alphanumeric, dash, or underscore letters

DefaultProjectId.title: DefaultProjectId
DefaultProjectId.description: Define the ID of the project to set as the default project

ContainerName.title: ContainerName
ContainerName.description: The name of the plate or tube containing the biosample, typically its barcode

ContainerPosition.title: ContainerPosition
ContainerPosition.description: The location of the biosample within a plate or other container, typically the well it is in

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Possible values are: New, Active, Done, QcFailed, Canceled

Ids.title: Ids
Ids.description: List the IDs of the biosamples to be updated

DefaultProjectId.title: DefaultProjectId
DefaultProjectId.description: Define the ID of the project to set as the default project

ContainerName.title: ContainerName
ContainerName.description: The name of the plate or tube containing the biosample, typically its barcode

ContainerPosition.title: ContainerPosition
ContainerPosition.description: The location of the biosample within a plate or other container, typically the well it is in

Quota.title: Quota
Quota.description: The total amount of Data the user is permitted to use.

HrefVariants.title: HrefVariants
HrefVariants.description: If set, provides the relative Uri to fetch the variants stored in the file

HrefCoverage.title: HrefCoverage
HrefCoverage.description: If set, provides the relative Uri to fetch the mean coverage statistics for data stored in the file

HrefParts.title: HrefParts
HrefParts.description: If set, provides the relative Uri to fetch a list of completed file parts for multi-part file uploads in progress

Limit.title: Limit
Limit.description: The maximum number of items to return
